m_descr: Combine two sensor values into one new variable. Version 1.02+ supports calibration function: sensora*constant1+constant2.
helper: Select one of the pre-defined operations
metric1-helper: Only change if your metric is other than the default setting: level
metric2-helper: Only change if your metric is other than the default setting: level
constant-helper: Enter constants (signed reals separated by a semi-colon (;)
